programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Oz tries to gain power in Gotham after Falcone's death; he considers recruiting Victor Aguilar; Sofia and Alberto work on family unity.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Sofia works to secure her family's strength; Oz attempts to play both the Falcone and Maroni families to his advantage.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: While Oz and Sofia seek to control the future of Gotham's drug trade, Victor is torn between his new life and his old.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Sofia confronts her past in Arkham State Hospital and makes plans for her future.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: With his nascent operation at stake, Oz makes a desperate move to turn the tables; Sofia strives to build a new legacy for herself.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Despite his enemies' attempts to smoke him out, Oz seeks to expand his reach in the city; Victor crosses paths with a former adversary.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Oz fights to preserve everything he's built; Sofia makes a shocking discovery.

programme.title: The Penguin
programme.desc: Truths are laid bare as Oz Cobb nears the end of his journey and his power struggle with Sofia comes to a head.

programme.title: 100-Foot Wave
programme.desc: After a startling realization about his health, Garrett returns to NazarÃ©, eager to get back to his peak; Tony and Justine join forces; when the first big swell of the season hits and big wave hopefuls flood NazarÃ©, nothing goes as planned.

programme.title: 100-Foot Wave
programme.desc: Garrett's wipeout leaves him seriously injured; CJ Macias gets back on a board after recovering from his own accident; Chumbo reflects on his surfing priorities; after Justine and Tony make a difficult decision, a tragedy strikes NazarÃ©.

programme.title: 100-Foot Wave
programme.desc: Garrett, Nicole, Cotty, Justine, Chumbo and Nic set out on an overnight boat to Cortes Bank, an unusual and legendary surf spot in the open ocean 100 miles off the coast of San Diego, when a rare swell appears.

programme.title: 100-Foot Wave
programme.desc: Top surfers from around the world flock to O'ahu for the prestigious Eddie Aikau Big Wave Invitational when the event is called for the first time in seven years; Garrett is not invited to participate; everyone celebrates the unexpected winner.

programme.title: 100-Foot Wave
programme.desc: Following the Eddie, the McNamara's move to Italy for a fresh start; just as Garrett begins to slow down in his new life away from the ocean, he hears of a perfect swell off the coast of Morocco and can't resist.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: Former nurse-turned-exotic animal broker Tonia Haddix fights to retain custody of her "kids", seven chimpanzees at the Missouri Primate Foundation; other chimp moms are introduced, including one who raised a baby chimpanzee alongside her daughter.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: PETA launches an investigation after a former Hollywood chimp named Tonka goes missing; it's a high-stakes legal battle, particularly in light of a brutal attack that happened years earlier when another chimp nearly killed a Connecticut woman.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: Actor Alan Cumming, who also has a special relationship with Tonka, adds $10,000 to a reward for Tonka's whereabouts, and the film crew faces an ethical dilemma as parallels are drawn to a previous PETA case that took a dangerous turn in Oregon.

programme.title: Chimp Crazy
programme.desc: Tonka's fate becomes clearer while Tonia struggles to let go and dreams of one day opening her own island sanctuary where she can live among chimpanzees.

programme.title: Ren Faire
programme.desc: King George Coulam, the aging founder of the Texas Renaissance Festival, has ruled over his subjects for decades; general manager Jeff Baldwin believes he is next in line to succeed, until kingpin Louie Migliaccio hatches a plan to buy the festival.

programme.title: Ren Faire
programme.desc: King George goes on an unsuccessful date; Jeff struggles to thwart Louie's bid for the crown; Darla Smith, a former elephant trainer, enters the fray with an agenda of her own.

programme.title: Ren Faire
programme.desc: Jeff gains the upper hand over Louie; Darla's promotion to co-general manager leads to disastrous consequences for both Jeff and herself; George finally lands on the only successor he can trust.

programme.title: Fantasmas
programme.desc: While ignoring his landlord's urgent letters, Julio obtains a gold oyster earring then promptly loses it at the club; Julio explains his sensitivity to shapes, colors, numbers and the alphabet to his fellow rideshare passengers.

programme.title: Fantasmas
programme.desc: Julio fixates on finding the oyster; he starts his search with Skyler, an influencer desperate to stay relevant.

programme.title: Fantasmas
programme.desc: After learning of a program that would free his mind from his body, Julio gets a lead on the lost oyster from a bartender, who takes him to the former site of the first gay hamster club, and later, a middle school.

programme.title: Fantasmas
programme.desc: When Julio repeatedly refuses to participate in a credit card commercial, Vanesja finds him a new opportunity in a superhero movie; in preparation, he goes to a jump rope class and employs a peculiar new social media manager named Pirulinpinpina.

programme.title: Fantasmas
programme.desc: As Julio searches for a loophole to avoid getting a proof of existence, Vanesja contemplates her purpose after run ins with a successful but depressed client and former professor; while pursuing a new passion, Bibo gets some unexpected advice.

programme.title: Fantasmas
programme.desc: Still in search of the lost oyster, Julio half heartedly strikes a deal to create a project for a corporation; but when Vanesja gets a surprising call about Julio's rejected work, an exciting new opportunity emerges.

programme.title: Y2K
programme.desc: On the last night of 1999, two high school juniors crash a New Year's Eve party, only to find themselves fighting for their lives when the terror of Y2K becomes a reality and all machines rise up against humanity.

programme.title: Blood Simple
programme.desc: Complications arise when the owner of a Texas bar pays a man (M. Emmet Walsh) to kill his wife (Frances McDormand) and her lover (John Getz).

programme.title: Stonewall
programme.desc: Kicked out by his parents, a gay teenager (Jeremy Irvine) leaves small-town Indiana for New York's Greenwich Village, where growing discrimination against the LGBT community leads to riots on June 28, 1969.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: In the 1800s, Gen. Nanisca trains a group of all-female warriors to protect the African kingdom of Dahomey from a foreign enemy that's determined to destroy their way of life.

programme.title: You Hurt My Feelings
programme.desc: A novelist's long-standing marriage is suddenly upended when she overhears her husband give his honest reaction to her latest book.

programme.title: The Batman
programme.desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that plagues the metropolis.

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: Deadshot (Will Smith), Harley Quinn (Margot Robbie), Captain Boomerang, Killer Croc and other armed supervillains unite to battle a mysterious and powerful entity, while the diabolical Joker (Jared Leto) launches an evil agenda of his own.

programme.title: The Suicide Squad
programme.desc: The government sends the most dangerous supervillains in the world to the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese. Armed with high-tech weapons, they trek through the dangerous jungle on a search-and-destroy mission with Col. Rick Flag.

programme.title: A Perfect Getaway
programme.desc: Newlyweds (Steve Zahn, Milla Jovovich) find terror in paradise when they encounter other hikers who claim that some tourists were found brutally murdered.

programme.title: Dear Ms.: A Revolution in Print
programme.desc: A deep dive into the storied and complex legacy of "Ms." magazine through the lens of some of its covers.

programme.title: Rules Don't Apply
programme.desc: An actress (Lily Collins) and her personal driver (Alden Ehrenreich) begin a forbidden romance while working for eccentric billionaire Howard Hughes (Warren Beatty) in 1958 Hollywood.

programme.title: The Legend of Ochi
programme.desc: In a remote village on the island of Carpathia, a shy farm girl named Yuri is raised to fear elusive animals known as ochi. But when Yuri discovers a wounded baby ochi has been left behind, she escapes on a quest to bring him home.

programme.desc: Brutus and Cassius struggle to raise foreign money for an army; Cicero sends a message to the Senate in which he gives his support to Octavian.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Atia turns the tables on Servilia; Octavian wins a battle; Vorenus learns of his children's fate.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Vorenus returns to the Collegium; two former adversaries patch up their differences.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Vorenus receives orders to execute scores of Rome's elite; Octavia reveals a secret to Atia; two armies clash, with the future of Rome at stake.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Servilia drives Atia to distraction; Octavian, Mark Antony and Lepidus agree to divide Rome's territories; Eirene insists that Pullo punish Gaia for insubordination.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Octavian proclaims a new era in Rome; Vorenus uncovers treachery behind a missing gold shipment.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: Rome is left suffering by the devastation of the grain supply,it triggers fresh hostilities between Octavian and Mark Antony; Octavian sends Atia to Egypt to plead with her ex-lover.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: In the aftermath of battle, Mark Antony returns to Alexandria; Octavian tries to convince Pullo to give up Cleopatra's palace; Vorenus flees with Caesarion.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Annabelle Comes Home
programme.desc: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren keep a possessed doll locked up in an artifacts room in their house. When the doll awakens the room's evil spirits, it soon becomes a night of terror for the couple's young daughter and her friends.

programme.title: Heretic
programme.desc: A diabolical Mr. Reed ensnares two young missionaries in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when they knock on the wrong door and are forced to prove their faith.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, a rescue diver must now confront an unimaginable threat -- a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark.

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: Bowling buddies become involved with a multimillionaire and his family wanted by mobsters in 1990s Los Angeles.

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Spies (Julia Roberts, Clive Owen) for rival corporations carry on a clandestine love affair while trying to find the formula for a product that will earn a fortune for the company that patents it first.

programme.title: Get a Job
programme.desc: A young man (Miles Teller) and his girlfriend (Anna Kendrick) struggle to find desirable employment after graduating from college.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: Convinced that Superman (Henry Cavill) is now a threat to humanity, Batman (Ben Affleck) embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: Aspiring actor Edward undergoes a radical medical procedure to drastically transform his appearance. But his new dream face turns into a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy company's annual gala in a high-rise building. It's now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: The owner (Ice Cube) of a barbershop faces pressure from a corporation that is opening establishments in his neighborhood.

programme.title: MaXXXine
programme.desc: Aspiring movie star and hustler Maxine Minx finally gets her big break. But as a mysterious killer stalks the starlets of 1980s Hollywood, a trail of blood threatens to reveal her sinister past.

programme.title: Katrina Babies
programme.desc: An intimate look at the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina and its impact on the youth of New Orleans.

programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: An evil spreads in 1956 France as a priest is murdered and Sister Irene once again comes face-to-face with the demonic nun Valak.

programme.title: The Terminator
programme.desc: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop a cyborg killing machine, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

programme.title: Maggie
programme.desc: When a deadly zombie virus sweeps the nation, a father stops at nothing to save his infected daughter.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when an enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: Surviving Ohio State
programme.desc: Based on the Jon Wertheim's 2020 Sports Illustrated article, Why Aren't More People Talking About the Ohio State Sex Abuse Scandal?

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: An exploration of transgender identity and legacy through the stories of icons April Ashley and Amanda Lear.

programme.title: Sing Sing
programme.desc: A man is imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose in staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An overprotective businessman (Bryan Cranston) panics after learning that his daughter's (Zoey Deutch) wealthy but socially awkward boyfriend (James Franco) plans to ask for her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: A thief (Leonardo DiCaprio) who enters people's dreams and steals their secrets gets a shot at redemption when he is given the dangerous task of planting an idea in someone's subconscious.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Hunger Games
programme.desc: A resourceful teen takes her younger sister's place in a brutal contest in which youths from each of 12 districts fight to the death on live television.

programme.desc: After their unprecedented victory in the 74th Hunger Games, Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark embark on a Victors Tour. Katniss senses rebellion is stirring, but a cruel change in the upcoming 75th Hunger Games may change Panem forever.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 2
programme.desc: Katniss faces mortal traps, deadly enemies and moral choices when she and her closest friends leave District 13 to assassinate President Snow and liberate the citizens of war-torn Panem.

programme.desc: Four couples find that paradise comes at a price when they must participate in therapy sessions at a tropical resort.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
